column3: Should be up to a min(closest peer RTT, 100ms) decrease in block announce latency for non-HB-compact peers, especially if combined with #9535.

utACK 241d8938f4b5de1d2564ec7e064d8b0b8efd84a4. This was [suggested](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/9441/#pullrequestreview-15542366) in #9441 and [expected](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/9441/#issuecomment-270989192) post-merge.
